channel.title: [Dementhium 639] Sending a random String

item.title: [Dementhium 639] Sending a random String
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:1, topic:426827”]I have been messing with only doubles and ints but now I’m wanting a random string

public String randomDeath() { return Death[(String)(Math.random()*Death.length)]; }
I am trying to get a random message to the killer in a battle
I attempted this

But it doesn’t work because idk how to send the string[/quote]
wtf

public String randomDeath() { return Death[new Random().nextInt(Death.length)]; }
or

public String randomDeath() { return Death[((int) Math.random()) * Death.length]; }

Read full topic
